item.description:
Starring: Kate Beckinsale, Gabriel Macht, Columbus Short, Alex O’Loughlin, Shawn Doyle Director: Dominic Sena Written by: Erich Hoeber, Jon Hoeber Type: Action/Adventure Length: Learn more at: Carrie Stetko, the lone U.S. Marshal assigned to Antarctica, investigates the continent’s first murder, which draws her into a shocking mystery. Now, with only three days until winter, Carrie must solve the crime before Antarctica is plunged into darkness and she is stranded with the killer.
<xobject width="470" height="264"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/C8M59Npkh8w&hl=en&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="470" height="264" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
item.name: WhiteOut At Salem 3 Theater at 7PM, movie starts at 7:15
